segments.text: My old man always harps on me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So does my father . I'm already used to it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I can't bear it , John .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How dare you say that ? What they do is just for our good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , but he really puts blame on me .
segments.speaker: S1
